verses.name: Nehemiah 7:25
verses.text: The children of Gibeon, ninety and five.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:26
verses.text: The men of Beth–lehem and Netophah, an hundred fourscore and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:27
verses.text: The men of Anathoth, an hundred twenty and eight.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:28
verses.text: The men of Beth–azmaveth, forty and two.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:29
verses.text: The men of Kirjath–jearim, Chephirah, and Beeroth, seven hundred forty and three.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:30
verses.text: The men of Ramah and Geba, six hundred twenty and one.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:31
verses.text: The men of Michmas, an hundred and twenty and two.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:32
verses.text: The men of Beth–el and Ai, an hundred twenty and three.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:33
verses.text: The men of the other Nebo, fifty and two.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:34
verses.text: The children of the other Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.
